sentence.Network_en: He dressed well and had impeccable manners.
sentence.Network_cn: 他衣冠楚楚，待人接物无可挑剔。

sentence.Network_en: He has an impeccable sense of timing.
sentence.Network_cn: 他有着无可挑剔的节奏感。

sentence.Network_en: She had an impeccable aristocratic pedigree.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(67) _ 上海疯狂英语 ... impeccability 无罪 impeccable 没有缺点的 impeccance 无罪.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... impassive 无动于衷的 impeccable 无瑕疵的 immortal 不朽的.
上班女郎_百度百科 ... ⒏punctual a. 严格守时的 ⒐impeccable a. 无懈可击的；无缺点的 ⒑shabbily ad. 衣衫褴褛地；不体面地.
He was proud of his impeccable good manners ., 他为自己无可挑剔的端庄举止而感到自豪.

list.abs: 什么意思... ... Impeccable flow 如此无懈可击 Impeccable Service 无可挑剔服务 We Impeccable 我们无可挑剔.
we start with impeccable quality to provide exceptional value . then we add a special personal touch .始于完美的质量，提供给你意想不到的价值，而且还加上我们特殊的个人情怀。
he was proud of his impeccable pedigree .他为他出身于名门望族而骄傲。
he was proud of his impeccable pedigree .他为他出身于名门望族而骄傲。
It conveyed prestige , quality , impeccable taste and unmistakable style ., 它传达了声望 , 品质 , 完美的品味以及明确无误的风格.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (in the theological sense): from Latin impeccabilis, from in- 'not' + peccare 'to sin'

entry.def: If you describe something such as someone's behaviour or appearance as impeccable, you are emphasizing that it is perfect and has no faults.

example.ex: She had impeccable taste in clothes...
example.tran: 她的穿衣品位无可挑剔。
她的学术背景无可挑剔。

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"向内,成为,进入,使……"; 2. 表示"不,无,非"

stems_affixes.word_buile: im向内,成为,进入,使……+passion激情+ed……的→adj.慷慨激昂的
im向内,成为,进入,使……+plic重叠+it→进入重叠→不直说→储蓄的
im不,无,非+moral道德的→adj.不道德的
im不,无,非+partial有偏见的→adj.公平的
im不,无,非+pecc斑点+able……的→无斑点的
im不,无,非+possible可能的→adj.不可能的
im向内,成为,进入,使……+migrate移居→入住
im向内,成为,进入,使……+pel推→推进,驱动
im向内,成为,进入,使……+peril危险→v.使处于危险中
im向内,成为,进入,使……+person人+ate表动词→进入别人→扮演别人
im向内,成为,进入,使……+prison监狱→v.监禁
im向内,成为,进入,使……+pulse跳动→内在推动→冲动

means.word_mean: 无错误的, 极好的, 无瑕疵的

sentences.en: Her work is executed with impeccable taste.
sentences.cn: 她的作品完美无缺，无可挑剔。

sentences.en: The furnishings and paintings had been chosen with impeccable taste.
sentences.cn: 室内的家具和油画都经过精心选择。

sentences.en: He stood before them, impeccable as ever.
sentences.cn: 他站在他们面前, 跟以往一样完美无瑕。
